questions.name: What should you not consider before creating a user view?

options.answer: what fields the users need to see
whether users can modify or only read the values
what are all fields user needs for the case.

questions.name: Why a user view is created
The data stored by user in a view can be used by other users?
From case life cycle the views can be added or updated
From designer studio, a harness can be modified to include a view
From designer studio, a section can be modified to include a view
What is intent-driven UI?

options.answer: Provide users with information when they need it.
provides all the information to specific users in a view regardless of when they need it
An intent-driven UI shows users what they need to know to perform a task

questions.name: ABC corporation has an ecommerce application where user can buy products. Showing them a link in the upper UI is an example of intent driven UI?
questions.hint: Designing user views, No as the change address will divert the user from shopping and its not very relevant to shopping.

questions.name: Users spend less time searching for relevant information when the intent is the focus of each case life cycle step.
What is a model driven UI?

options.answer: Align the user view with the case life cycle to ensure the user interface is model-driven.
A model-driven approach results in faster application development, and a contextually sensitive UI
UI that can quickly change when business rules change.

questions.name: What is a model driven UI?

options.answer: Align the user view with the case life cycle to ensure the user interface is model-driven.
A model-driven approach results in faster application development, and a contextually sensitive UI
The requirements of each step of case life cycle stage dictate the information in the view.

questions.name: While designing a simple UI, what things need to be taken care?

options.answer: Minimize data elements to an optimal set that is critical to the task.
Focus on what users are trying to accomplish.
The life cycle and the next best action from the current step are irrevant information
Always, Users should be referring some documents on how to use a view

questions.name: While designing a simple UI, what things need to be taken care?

options.answer: Minimize data elements to an optimal set that is critical to the task.
Focus on what users are trying to accomplish.
Be aware of where users are in the life cycle and the next best action
Users should not have to guess how to proceed while looking at a view

questions.name: While designing a simple UI, what things need to be taken care?

options.answer: show any data element which might be required to the task.
Focus on what case`s outcome will be.
Be aware of where users are in the life cycle and the next best action
Users should not have to guess how to proceed while looking at a view

questions.name: What are the best UI practices?

options.answer: Create patterns in language, layout, and design to help users complete their tasks.
Design consistency enables users to recognize similar tasks in other application views.

The same feature should be given in different flavor so user won`t get bore. for e.g delete an item from the ecommerce application link is in icon for electronics item and for rest items, it`s a button
The labels and placements of elements doesn`t play any part in UI best practices

questions.hint: Restrict choices to a set of valid values and allows users to select only one value. You can use radio buttons when only a small number of options (for example, fewer than five) is available.

questions.name: ABC Corp is having an insuarnace application where mediclaim case can be created from insurance case. Insurance case is having insured party details. Mediclaim case must need to make sure the party is insured to proceed in it`s life cycle. How this can be achieved?

options.answer: insured party data can be shared from insurance case to mediclaim case when mediclaim case is initialised
mediclaim case cannot access the insured party data provided earlier to insurance case
insured party details can be copied to mediclaim case only if mediclaim case is child case of insurance case
insured party details can be copied to mediclaim case only if mediclaim case is sibling case of insurance case

questions.name: Data propagation is beneficial due to

options.answer: save time by eliminating the manual task of copying data.
save time by eliminating the manual task to provide relevant information to caseworkers
data propagation can be done to case after the case is created.
data propagation can be done for parent case too

questions.name: Data propagation ensures that the appropriate information is moved into a child case

ABC corpor is creating an insurance case and mediclaim case is a child case of insurance case. in first stage of of insurance case, mdiclaim case is created and insured data is available to mediclaim case. In second stage of insurance case, contact number of insured party is upodated in insurance case. will that info available in mediclaim case?

ABC corpor is creating an insurance case and mediclaim case is a child case of insurance case. in first stage of of insurance case, mdiclaim case is created and insured data is available to mediclaim case. In mediclaim case, contact number of insured party is upodated. will that info available in insurance case?

ABC corpor is creating an insurance case and mediclaim case is a child case of insurance case. in second stage of of insurance case, mediclaim case is created and insured data is available to mediclaim case. In first stage of insurance case, contact number of insured party is upodated. will that info available in mediclaim case?
Data propagation can only be done using properties or using data transform too.

options.answer: pega designer studio only allows properties using case designer.
Pega express allows properties as well as data transform.
pega designer studio allows properties as well as data transform using case designer.

questions.name: Can a developer use properties or data transform in create case  in CREATE CASE step.
As a developer you want to transfer a page from a  pagelist where the pySelected field is true. How this page data can be used as a data propagation to child case.

options.answer: A single page cant be transferred to a child case, whole pagelist need to be transferred by using property
A single page cant be transferred to a child case, whole pagelist need to be transferred by using data transform
A single page can be transferred to a child case by using property
A single page can be transferred to a child case by using conditional logic of data transform

questions.name: You can update a child case, or all the child cases of a parent case, after the case has been created.

options.answer: it is possible to do from pega express
This option is available only in the Case Designer in Designer Studio.

questions.name: Case calculations are available only in the Case Designer in Designer Studio.
If a insurance case generates multiple mediclaim cases, a case calculation on the parent insurance case can sum the insurance cost total for each of the mediclaim child cases.

options.answer: This can be achieved by using case calculation
there is no such thing as case calculation

questions.name: Data propagation to a spin-off case is configured in the Designer Studio, using the Case Designer
data propagation can be done in designer studio for child case is Case explorer>>Parent case >>Settings>>add properties or data transform for Designer studio
data propagation can be done in designer studio for any spin off case is Case explorer>>Parent case >>Work flow>>Step>>More>>Utilities>>Create Case to add data transform for Designer studio
Using spin off case feature , a parent case can be created from a child case.
You can specify a data transform when creating a spin-off, child, or multiple child cases from designer studio case designer?
You can update a child case, or all the child cases of a parent case, by using the Update a Case smart shape in the case designer.
Updating an existing case can be configured in Designer Studio, in the Case Designer. This feature is not available in Pega Express.
Update case smart shape utility has All child cases (and descendants) or A single case
ABC corp wants to conditionally update few of its child case, not all the child cases. How to do it?

options.answer: select All child cases (and descendants) option from Update case smart shape of parent case and add the conditional logic to the data transform
Add conditional logic to All child cases (and descendants) option from Update case smart shape of parent case

questions.name: ABC corp`s insurance case can have only one mediclaim case as child case. ABC corp wants to conditionally update mediclaim child case. How to do it?

options.answer: parent case stage should have one update steps with configured condition to update a single case
Add conditional logic to All child cases (and descendants) option from Update case smart shape of parent case

questions.name: You can update a child case of a parent case, by using the Update a Case smart shape in the case designer.

options.answer: parent case stage should have one update steps configured to update a single case by providing the child case id (In the With ID, enter the property reference or unique identifier for an open case.)
There is no way we can pass the child case id to the update case step from parent case stages.

questions.name: Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer. This feature is not available in Pega Express.
Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer>>case explorer>>parent case>>settings>>calculation
Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer>>case explorer>>parent case>>settings>>calculation for more than one case types
Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer>>case explorer>>parent case>>settings>>calculation for only one case type
Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer. This feature can do any arithmatic operation.
Calculations are configured in Designer Studio, using the Case Designer. This feature can do only sum arithmatic operation.
in calculation, the calculated property of parent case and the case type property should be of same type.
When does data propagation occur?

options.answer: When a value in the child case or spin-off case changes
When a parent's value changes and a data transform is used to configure the data propagation

questions.name: You have a purchase request case and want to spin off a supplier case for a new supplier. How can you copy data to the supplier case?

options.answer: the Update a Case smart shape

questions.name: Use __________ to sum a value in a child case and record the total value in the parent case.

options.answer: the Update a Case smart shape

questions.name: A Class named ABC-data-Office maps to office table. Recently, there is a new office opened in Germany. Earlier all offices were in USA. So developer need to add a country column to Office table. How to map this column to an existing property named CountryID
